name: Boss Of The Mafia
description:
Boss Of The Mafia is a side-scrolling game in which you play as the boss of the mafia! In this incredibly difficult platformer you have to get through all the obstacles and dangerous traps in order to complete this game to the end. Cool relaxing jazz music will help you with this!

Probably every person at least once in his life dreamed of becoming a crime boss. Become the boss of the mafia in this game. You will need to collect all the door keys to get to the next level. But don't think that this will be an easy task. You have to get through very difficult and dangerous traps. It will be very difficult to complete the level. Nice music and cool graphics will immerse you in this world of adventure with your head. Get real pleasure passing incredibly difficult and dangerous traps. It will be incredible Lego to die in this game !!!

Features of the game:
Catchy, intuitive gameplay!
Incredibly cool, challenging and interesting levels!
Nice music and cool atmosphere!
Incredibly beautiful graphics!
